attributes.action: Reinstate the original gravestone of Wng Cmr Guy Gibsons dog a RAF Scampton
attributes.additional_details: Reinstated the original gravestone complete with name. You should not try to change history to fit in with modern day thinking. What happened happened and it important to remember and learn from it. This was an improtant part of WW11 and of 617 (The Dambusters) squadron. Its an insult to the RAF and their memory. These brave men deserve all the honers we can bestow on them.
attributes.background: The gravestone at RAF Scampton has been changed due to PC. This is part of history and therefore should not be tampered with.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the RAF, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could contact the RAF about this directly.
